title: Celestial Wand
summaries: The Celestial Wand is a pet-summoning item sold by the Traveling Merchant for 1 PC, and is always sold alongside the Star Princess set. It summons Estee, who follows the player around. Estee will emit a beam trail while flying at high speed to catch up with the player, which resembles that of a Fallen Star.

statistics.Buy: 1 PC
statistics.Sell: 20 GC
